R

read() - Method in class ch.hevs.isi.field.BooleanRegister
Read the value of a register in minecraft and save it in a datapoint
read() - Method in class ch.hevs.isi.field.FloatRegister
This function will read the value of a register in minecraft(between 0 and 1), adapt it to a real value and save the value in a datapoint
readBoolean(int) - Method in class ch.hevs.isi.field.ModbusAccessor
This function will read a boolean value given a register Address
readBytes(InputStream) - Static method in class ch.hevs.isi.utils.Utility
Reads the incoming data from an input stream as long as there is something to read and saved the data in an array of bytes.
readFloat(int) - Method in class ch.hevs.isi.field.ModbusAccessor
This function will read a float value given a register Address
readLine(InputStream) - Static method in class ch.hevs.isi.utils.Utility
Reads lines of text from the given input stream.
readNBytes(InputStream, int) - Static method in class ch.hevs.isi.utils.Utility
Reads from the given input stream an amount of bytes and retrieves these data as an array of bytes.
removeMember(DataPointListener) - Method in class ch.hevs.isi.core.ListenersRegistry
This simply removes a connector from the registry (unregister)
rnd - Static variable in class ch.hevs.isi.utils.Utility
Object to get some random values...
run() - Method in class ch.hevs.isi.field.PollTask
An override of the function run, this task will be called each x times (x defined in MinecraftController) and will read every register in the map
run() - Method in class ch.hevs.isi.SmartControl
This function will be called each x time (x defined in StartWorld) and will read every register in the map And take decisions that will update the datapoints and then the Field ...
